price: Kandi twahishuriye Musa (tugira tuti) “Jyana abagaragu banjye (Abayisiraheli) nijoro! Mu by’ukuri muraza gukurikirwa (na Farawo n’ingabo ze).”
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī innakum muttabaʿūna
